mapper.insert: insert into fund_order_${storeId} (id, type, create_time, apply_order_id, order_status, bank_account_id, money, user_id, remark) values (#{id}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{applyOrderId}, #{orderStatus}, #{bankAccountId}, #{money}, #{userId}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update fund_order_${storeId} set create_time = now(), order_status = -1, user_id = #{userId}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id} and order_status > 0;
mapper.select: select id, type, create_time, apply_order_id, order_status, bank_account_id, money, user_id, remark from fund_order_${storeId} where id = #{id};
